name: James Williams
description: I am serious romantic loving passionate man looking for a serious lover that can come and share this life with me in the USA I enjoy all types of sports and I love children hope to hear form ladies that know when they see a great man and realize how great a opertunity this is being with such a great man as I am. I do not play games and can give a great serious lady of beauty the love she needs by a real man like I am I hear there is lots of term oil in your country now there and I hope this would make you give second thoughts of coming at this time to enjoy this future of love passion romance and respect a serious man like me can give to that real lover and lady that want a greater future now instead of latter come join me soon in my home in the USA and enjoy real love for ever with me now.
